CatDescriptText: The Hub Hotel appears in city directories by 1948, located at 5 Reed Street in the present-day Crawford-Roberts neighborhood, and run by Lorenzo Hackner and John Clark.  It is a three-story brick building with its name in neon over two windows between the awning topped doors.
TitMainTitle: Exterior of the Hub Hotel, with arched windows and two striped awnings over two doors, corner view, Reed Street
